Projects.title: Full Stack Website
desc: Developed a full stack blog website using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js), with a focus on performance, scalability, and user engagement. Implemented a dynamic content management system with CRUD functionality for blog posts,

User authentication, and role-based access. Integrated a responsive front-end using React and Redux for state management, while the back-end API in Node.js and Express handles data processing and security. Optimized the MongoDB database for efficient data retrieval and used JWT for secure authentication.

Projects.title: Wordpress Website
desc: Developed a custom WordPress website focused on functionality, user experience, and SEO optimization. Customized themes and plugins to align with the clientâ€™s branding and specific requirements. Integrated essential plugins for SEO, security, and performance optimization to ensure fast load times and improved search engine rankings.

Built responsive page layouts to deliver a seamless experience across devices, and used custom post types and taxonomies for easier content management. Provided post-launch support, including tutorials for content updates, ensuring a smooth handover for ongoing site management.

Projects.title: LUDOang
desc: LUDOang is a game that my team and I created for a final project in my university. The game is built python, pygame, and OpenGL. The game is a 2D game that is inspired by a Ludo game. The game has a few features such randomZone, and a 3D dice.

RandomZone is a feature that allows the player to get a random number of steps. The 3D dice is a feature that allows the player to roll a 3D dice. The game also has a few other features menuy screen and also loading screen.
Beside that the game also has a audio theme that will play when the game is started. The game also has a few sound effects such as dice roll sound, and a sound when the player win the game.

Projects.title: React Realtime Chat
desc: My ambitious project that delves into the world of interactive web development using React. This project is a realtime chat application that allows users to create chat rooms and chat with other users in realtime. The application is built using React, Firebase, and Daisy UI.

This project is my second react project and my first project using Firebase. I learned a lot about how to use Firebase and how to use React to create a realtime application. I also learned how to use Daisy UI, a CSS framework that is built on top of Tailwind CSS.

Projects.title: React Tools
desc: React Tools is a groundbreaking and user-friendly project that brings together a comprehensive collection of tools and components crafted with cutting-edge technologies, including React, React Router, and TailwindCSS. What sets this project apart is that it's not just a suite of powerful features, but it's also a significant milestone as it marks my very first venture into the world of React development.

Unlike traditional web applications, React Tools cleverly utilizes browser local storage, eliminating the need for external databases. This not only ensures seamless performance but also prioritizes user data privacy.

The Todo List keeps tasks in check with intuitive task management capabilities, ensuring you never miss a beat. The note-taking feature provides a hassle-free way to jot down ideas and crucial information, accessible whenever inspiration strikes. Additionally, our robust expense tracker simplifies financial management by recording and categorizing expenses, delivering insightful spending analysis.

Projects.title: Aleph Discord Bot
desc: Aleph is a Discord bot that I created for my dircord server to use. The bot is built using Python and the discord.py library. The bot has image grabber feauture that takes argument (keywords) and returns an image from the internet.

Other than that this bot has a few other features such as utility command to delete a messages, and a command to get the server's ping. This bot is still in development and I plan to add more features in the future.

Projects.title: LPTK Cup 2023 Website
desc: LPTK Cup UM is a website that I created for a competition held by  the Universitas Negeri Malang. The website is mainly built using Laravel and Bootstrap. The website has a few features such as a registration form, a login system, article system, file upload,  and a dashboard for the admin to manage the contents.

This project is my second freelance project, this project is not as big as my first freelance project but I learned a lot from this project. I learn how to manage a project and how to work with a team.

Projects.title: NU INO Website
desc: My first freelance project. This project is a website for a School based on a JALAKAR curriculum. The website is built mainly using Laravel and Bootstrap.
This website is LMS like system, have a user management, user auth, quiz and material for student and FAQ
In this project I learned how to work with a team and how to manage a project. I also learned new library such as livewire and alpine.js.
